general_advisory: Due to forecast of light to moderate rainfall, farmers are advised not to apply fertilizer & chemicals. Strengthen the bunds of paddy field and check for any rat holes or leakage. After rain, trim the bund and keep clean to avoid insect multiplication.

advisory: Regular monitoring of the crop for incidence of pests and diseases should be done.
After rain, there is a chance of infestation of leaf folder and yellow stem borer, apply Cartap hydrochloride 50SP @ 400g/acre or Fipronil 5 SC @ 400ml/acre.
After rain, there is a chance of insect pest attack, survey regularly and take action by consulting department personnel.
Go for intercultural operation and apply 26 kg urea per acre at 45 days after planting and apply mulching @ 2 t/acre.
Do not allow water to remain stagnant in the field.
Due to weather conditions, there is a chance of aphids in maize, to manage apply Dimethoate @ 2 ml/liter of water.
Due to weather, tikka disease is seen, to manage spray Carbendazim @ 2 g/liter of water.
Do not allow stagnation of water as papaya plant is sensitive to waterlogging.
Drench Carbendazim or Mancozeb @ 2 g/lt of water near the root zone to avoid fungal diseases.
Do not allow rainwater to remain stagnant near the base of the plant.
Provide stakings to newly planted saplings to avoid wind damage.
To manage Thrips population in chili, spray Imidachloprid or Dimethoate @ 2ml/lt of water.
Provide regular feeding @ 0.35 of body mass.
Provide clean drinking water to poultry.
Take preventive action for any disease in consultation with department personnel.
